Texts.Eng:
A few misconceptions were born about existence of batponies - most about alleged vampirism. To debunk that, the batponies are curious hybrid of an equine and a thestral, favouring dark areas where their echolocation pierces through the darkness. They also drink... fruit juices off the fruits, most notably apples, and nil' blood.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Max Food x^green;1.5^reset;, +^green;5%^reset; Charisma, Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Darkness, Poison
  ^cyan;Racial Ability^reset;: Echolocation, Batpony Flight

  Alien/Fleshy: Energy x^red;0.9^reset;, Damage x^red;0.95^reset;, +^green;25^reset;% E. Regen
  Cold: Health x^red;0.9^reset; and -^red;20^reset;% E. Regen
  ^cyan;Cold and exceedingly hot places that are in shade have no boons or penalties.^reset;
